item.title: Controlling IKEA Tradfri devices from your computer
item.description: I stumbled upon a fun blogpost about the Dumbass Home and it turned me onto the IKEA Tr√•dfri line of products. So I got a couple, and figured out how to control them from my laptop (or say a Raspberry PI) from node. Here’s how to do it.
